official_title: A bill to increase civil service retirement annuities of certain employees who retired before July 18, 1966, with reduced annuities.

summary.text: Authorizes the increase in civil service retirement annuities of specified Federal employees who retired before July 18, 1966, with reduced annuities.

titles.title: A bill to increase civil service retirement annuities of certain employees who retired before July 18, 1966, with reduced annuities.
